EmailTemplate.name: Forms Final Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: BAP Forms {!Forms__c.Form_Type_Name__c}: Rejected! Record ID: {!Forms__c.Form_Record_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your submission of BAP Forms {!Forms__c.Form_Type_Name__c}, Record ID {!Forms__c.Form_Record_Name__c} has been rejected!
Please review these comments from your approver:
{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Please address these comments and resubmit your form https://forms.epa.gov.
